price: 他说：“你们上船去吧！这只船的航行和停舶都是奉安拉之名的。我的养主确是至赦的，确是至慈的。”
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱرۡكَبُواْ فِيهَا بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجۡر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرۡسَىٰهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waqāla ir'kabū fīhā bis'mi al-lahi majrahā wamur'sāhā inna rabbī laghafūrun raḥīmun
